mapper.select: SELECT a.uid, m.nickname, a.title, a.content, a.hits, a.created_date FROM Article as a JOIN Member as m ON m.uid = a.member_uid WHERE a.uid = #{article_uid}
SELECT c.uid, m.nickname, c.comment, c.created_date FROM Comment as c JOIN Member as m ON m.uid = c.member_uid WHERE c.article_uid = #{article_uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE Article SET hits = hits + 1 WHERE uid = #{article_uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Article (member_uid, board_uid, title, content) VALUES (#{uid}, #{board_uid}, #{title}, #{content})
